contents.name: mag_x
contents.description: Current magnetometer x-axis. 3D digital magnetic sensor has a magnetic field full scale of +-4,+-8,+-12,+-16 gauss.

contents.name: mag_y
contents.description: Current magnetometer y-axis. 3D digital magnetic sensor has a magnetic field full scale of +-4,+-8,+-12,+-16 gauss.

contents.name: mag_z
contents.description: Current magnetometer z-axis. 3D digital magnetic sensor has a magnetic field full scale of +-4,+-8,+-12,+-16 gauss.
